entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
